PW_6_24: Password has to be between 6 and 24 characters.
PW_8_24_UPPER_LOWER: Password has to be 8 to 24 characters long and contain uppercase and lowercase characters.
PW_8_24_UPPER_LOWER_DIGIT: Password has to be 8 to 24 characters long and contain digits, uppercase and lowercase characters.
PW_8_24_UPPER_LOWER_DIGIT_SPECIAL: Password has to be 8 to 24 characters long and contain uppercase and lowercase characters, digits, and a special character.
